*all packages include items included in the booth package
Set up a booth then...

At the venue: your logo will be on the center of the floor, you will be sponsoring the main event, you can put full page inserts in the fight cards, instant replays on the big screen will be sponsored by you."
The main event package incudes eight first row tickets, 4 vendor passes, and 20 general admittance tickets.
Outside of the venue: you will be seen on approximately 200 television commercials, and heard on approximately 150 radio commercials.

At the venue: your logo will appear prominently in either one of the fighters corners (half of each fight sponsored by you), you will be sponsoring the co-main event, you can put half page inserts in the fight cards.
The co-main event package includes four first row tickets, 2 vendor passes, and 10 general admission tickets.
Outside of the venue: you will be seen on approximately 200 television commercials, and heard on approximately 150 radio commercials.
At the venue: your logo will be seen on the cage panels facing the fighters and the crowd, you will have one logo on the floor, you will have a sponsored seating section, you can do a give away.
The logo package in cludes two second row tickets, two vendor passes, and five general admission tickets.
Outside of the venue: your logo will be seen in future productions, fight cards, posters, fliers, and more.
At the venue: you can set up a booth, hang banners/posters etc., sponsor a single fight, get access to the microphone for one minute, your company logo will be seen in the big screen slide show.
The booth package includes two second row tickets, two vendor passes, and five general admittance tickets.
Outside of the venue: your logo will be seen on our fliers (4,000), posters (500), and social media (10,000+ followers). WE BRING YOU BUSINESS.
